topic.title: Continuity Of Care Document - conformance rules

ol.li:
SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF-140), such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Problem Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.11)

SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Family History Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.4)

SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Social History Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.15)

SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Alerts Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.2)

SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF-298), such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Medications Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.8)

SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF-388), such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Results Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.14)

SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Procedures Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.12)

SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Encounters Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.3)

SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Plan Of Care Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.10)

SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Immunizations Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.6)

SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF-381), such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Vital Signs Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.16)

SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Medical Equipment Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.7)

SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Functional Status Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.5)

SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Advance Directives Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.1)

SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Payers Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.9)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="34133-9" Summarization of episode note (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF-1)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] languageCode (CONF-5)
languageCode has the form nn, or nn-CC. The nn portion SHALL be an ISO-639-1 language code in lower case. The CC portion, if present, SHALL be an ISO-3166 country code in upper case (CONF-6)

MAY contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF-15), such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Purpose Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.13)

SHALL satisfy: Contains exactly one documentationOf / serviceEvent (CONF-2)
[OCL]: self.documentationOf->one(doc : cda::DocumentationOf | not doc.serviceEvent.oclIsUndefined())

documentationOf / serviceEvent / @classCode SHALL be 'PCPR' (CONF-3)
[OCL]: self.documentationOf->one(doc : cda::DocumentationOf | doc.serviceEvent.classCode = vocab::ActClassRoot::PCPR)

SHALL satisfy: documentationOf / serviceEvent contains exactly one serviceEvent / effectiveTime / low and exactly one serviveEvent / effectiveTime / high (CONF-4)
[OCL]: self.documentationOf->one(doc : cda::DocumentationOf | not doc.serviceEvent.effectiveTime.low.oclIsUndefined() and not doc.serviceEvent.effectiveTime.high.oclIsUndefined())

SHALL NOT contain templateId / @extension (CONF-8)
[OCL]: self.templateId->forAll(id : datatypes::II | id.root = '2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1' implies id.extension.oclIsUndefined())
SHALL satisfy: effectiveTime is expressed with precision to include seconds (CONF-9)
SHALL satisfy: effectiveTime includes an explicit time zone offset (CONF-10)

SHALL satisfy: Contains one or two recordTarget (CONF-11)
[OCL]: self.recordTarget->size() = 1 or self.recordTarget->size() =2

SHOULD satisfy: Contains one or more author / assignedAuthor / assignedPerson and/or author / assignedAuthor / representedOrganization (CONF-12)
[OCL]: self.author->exists(author : cda::Author | not author.assignedAuthor.assignedPerson.oclIsUndefined() or not author.assignedAuthor.representedOrganization.oclIsUndefined())

If author has an associated representedOrganization with no assignedPerson or assignedAuthoringDevice, then the value for author / assignedAuthor / id / @NullFlavor SHALL be 'NA' (CONF-13)
[OCL]: self.author->exists(author : cda::Author | (not author.assignedAuthor.representedOrganization.oclIsUndefined() and author.assignedAuthor.assignedPerson.oclIsUndefined() and author.assignedAuthor.assignedAuthoringDevice.oclIsUndefined()) implies author.assignedAuthor.id->one(id : datatypes::II | id.nullFlavor = vocab::NullFlavor::NA))

MAY satisfy: Contains one or more informationRecipient (CONF-14)
[OCL]: self.informationRecipient->size() > 0

The value for component / structuredBody / component / section / entry / @typeCode MAY be 'DRIV' "is derived from" 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002 ActRelationshipType STATIC, to indicate that the CDA Narrative Block is fully derived from the structured entries. (CONF-28)
A CCD entry SHOULD explicitly reference its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1 <content>). (CONF-29)
A section MAY contain one or more comments, either as a clinical statement or nested under another clinical statement. (CONF-502)
Contains exactly one [1..1] typeId, where its data type is InfrastructureRootTypeId
Contains exactly one [1..1] id, where its data type is II
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="34133-9" Summarization of episode note (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF-1)
Contains exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime, where its data type is TS
Contains exactly one [1..1] confidentialityCode, where its data type is CE

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] languageCode (CONF-5)
languageCode has the form nn, or nn-CC. The nn portion SHALL be an ISO-639-1 language code in lower case. The CC portion, if present, SHALL be an ISO-3166 country code in upper case (CONF-6)
Contains at least one [1..*] recordTarget, where its type is Record Target
Contains at least one [1..*] author, where its type is Author
Contains exactly one [1..1] custodian, where its type is Custodian
Contains exactly one [1..1] component, where its type is Component2

SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF-140), such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Problem Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.11)

SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Family History Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.4)

SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Social History Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.15)

SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Alerts Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.2)

SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF-388), such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Results Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.14)

SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Procedures Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.12)

SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Encounters Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.3)

SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Plan Of Care Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.10)

SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Immunizations Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.6)

SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF-381), such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Vital Signs Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.16)

SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Medical Equipment Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.7)

SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Functional Status Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.5)

SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Advance Directives Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.1)

SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Payers Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.9)

MAY contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF-15), such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Purpose Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.13)

SHALL satisfy: Contains exactly one documentationOf / serviceEvent (CONF-2)
[OCL]: self.documentationOf->one(doc : cda::DocumentationOf | not doc.serviceEvent.oclIsUndefined())

documentationOf / serviceEvent / @classCode SHALL be 'PCPR' (CONF-3)
[OCL]: self.documentationOf->one(doc : cda::DocumentationOf | doc.serviceEvent.classCode = vocab::ActClassRoot::PCPR)

SHALL satisfy: documentationOf / serviceEvent contains exactly one serviceEvent / effectiveTime / low and exactly one serviveEvent / effectiveTime / high (CONF-4)
[OCL]: self.documentationOf->one(doc : cda::DocumentationOf | not doc.serviceEvent.effectiveTime.low.oclIsUndefined() and not doc.serviceEvent.effectiveTime.high.oclIsUndefined())
languageCode has the form nn, or nn-CC. The nn portion SHALL be an ISO-639-1 language code in lower case. The CC portion, if present, SHALL be an ISO-3166 country code in upper case (CONF-6)

SHALL NOT contain templateId / @extension (CONF-8)
[OCL]: self.templateId->forAll(id : datatypes::II | id.root = '2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1' implies id.extension.oclIsUndefined())
SHALL satisfy: effectiveTime is expressed with precision to include seconds (CONF-9)
SHALL satisfy: effectiveTime includes an explicit time zone offset (CONF-10)

SHALL satisfy: Contains one or two recordTarget (CONF-11)
[OCL]: self.recordTarget->size() = 1 or self.recordTarget->size() =2

SHOULD satisfy: Contains one or more author / assignedAuthor / assignedPerson and/or author / assignedAuthor / representedOrganization (CONF-12)
[OCL]: self.author->exists(author : cda::Author | not author.assignedAuthor.assignedPerson.oclIsUndefined() or not author.assignedAuthor.representedOrganization.oclIsUndefined())

If author has an associated representedOrganization with no assignedPerson or assignedAuthoringDevice, then the value for author / assignedAuthor / id / @NullFlavor SHALL be 'NA' (CONF-13)
[OCL]: self.author->exists(author : cda::Author | (not author.assignedAuthor.representedOrganization.oclIsUndefined() and author.assignedAuthor.assignedPerson.oclIsUndefined() and author.assignedAuthor.assignedAuthoringDevice.oclIsUndefined()) implies author.assignedAuthor.id->one(id : datatypes::II | id.nullFlavor = vocab::NullFlavor::NA))

MAY satisfy: Contains one or more informationRecipient (CONF-14)
[OCL]: self.informationRecipient->size() > 0

The value for component / structuredBody / component / section / entry / @typeCode MAY be 'DRIV' "is derived from" 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002 ActRelationshipType STATIC, to indicate that the CDA Narrative Block is fully derived from the structured entries. (CONF-28)
A CCD entry SHOULD explicitly reference its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1 <content>). (CONF-29)
A section MAY contain one or more comments, either as a clinical statement or nested under another clinical statement. (CONF-502)

body.codeblock: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <ClinicalDocument xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:hl7-org:v3 CDA.xsd"> <typeId root="2.16.840.1.113883.1.3"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1"/> <id root="1622479886"/> <code code="34133-9" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Summarization of episode note"/> <title/> <effectiveTime/> <confidentialityCode code="Value"/> <languageCode/> <recordTarget/> <author/> <custodian/> <component> <structuredBody> <component> <section> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.11"/> <id root="2030179321"/> <code code="11450-4" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Problem list"/> <title/> <languageCode/> <entry> <act/> </entry> </section> </component> <component> <section/> </component> <component> <section/> </component> <component> <section/> </component> <component> <section/> </component> <component> <section/> </component> <component> <section/> </component> <component> <section/> </component> <component> <section/> </component> <component> <section/> </component> <component> <section/> </component> <component> <section/> </component> <component> <section/> </component> <component> <section/> </component> <component> <section/> </component> <component> <section/> </component> </structuredBody> </component> </ClinicalDocument>
